title: 85% of business leaders would let a robot make their decisions
description: Overwhelmed by data and decision-making, many business leaders are ready for robots to take over.

title: Aqara just launched a smart home presence sensor with fall detection
description: The new presence sensor also offers precision human detection in multiple zones, making it possible to set up different automations for different zones to run at the same time.

title: ChatGPT can help you shop now via Mercari's AI-powered shopping assistant
description: If secondhand shopping was less time-consuming and easier to navigate, who wouldn't do it more?

title: This Anker 3D printer blew me away with how fast and easy it is to use
description: Looking for the best 3D printer for beginners? The AnkerMate M5 gives you perfect prints in a fraction of the time it takes a traditional machine to do the same.

title: People are turning to ChatGPT to troubleshoot their tech problems now
description: A new study concludes many people are ditching Google for ChatGPT when searching for IT advice online.

title: Why this 11-port dock is perfect for professionals who travel
description: The OWC Thunderbolt Go Dock supports all the latest ports and connections, but its biggest selling point puts it above the competition.

title: DeepMind melds with Google's Brain Team to accelerate AI growth
description: Google appears determined to ramp up its AI efforts, despite recent concerns from employees on the company's execution. Here's its latest move.

title: Stack Overflow joins Reddit and Twitter in charging AI companies for training data
description: The new changes could come as soon as the middle of the year.

title: How to add online accounts to Ubuntu 23.04 (and why you should)
description: Most Linux distributions make it very easy to add various online accounts to the desktop. Find out just how simple it is with the release of Ubuntu 23.04.

title: Roborock's new 2-in-1 vacuum is expensive, but my floors tell me it's worth every penny
description: Review: The Roborock S8 Pro Ultra can tackle the dirtiest messes in your home, but you'll pay a premium to reap all of its benefits.

title: Double your memory for free when you buy the LG gram Style today
description: The LG gram Style laptop is stylish, lightweight, and features LPDDR5 6000 MHz RAM for fast performance. You can also double your memory for free for a limited time.

title: HP's new Envy x360 is the world's first IMAX-certified laptop -- but there's a catch
description: HP's upgraded Envy laptops include a 15.6-inch model that supports IMAX visuals and audio. Here's everything you need to know.

title: A team of ex-Apple employees wants to replace smartphones with this AI projector
description: Humane, a startup that is backed by OpenAI's CEO and Microsoft, demoed its interface projecting device at TED 2023. Here's a first look.

title: How to build a custom AirTag (that Apple doesn't want you to have)
description: I love Airtags, but that the flying saucer design isn't all that convenient, especially for carrying around in a wallet. Let's change that!

title: Track your carbon emissions with this new app
description: Take control of your carbon footprint with this app designed to help you get closer to net-zero emissions.

title: What is AI? Everything to know about artificial intelligence
description: If you want to know about the fascinating and fast-developing technologies of artificial intelligence, we cover everything from machine learning and general AI to neural networks.

title: How to organize your Google Drive: 5 tips to know
description: If you want to improve your daily Google Drive efficiency, these five tips can help.
